A

addCity(City) - Method in class models.Player
addCity() adds a new City Object to the list of cities this player owns
addOwnershipIndicators(City) - Method in class views.CivView
Add an indicator to each tile under a given city's ownership/influence
addRangeIndicators(Unit) - Method in class views.CivView
Add an indicator to each tile that a given unit can currently move to and/or attack.
addUnit(Unit) - Method in class models.Player
addUnit() adds a new Unit Object to the list of Units this player owns
attack(Tile, City) - Method in class controllers.CivController
Overloaded method, to be called when a unit attacks a city Attacker attacks the city; city's health is checked.
attack(Tile, Tile) - Method in class controllers.CivController
Unit on attackerTile attacks the Unit on defenderTile.
attackMult - Variable in class components.Tile
 
attackOwnKillEnemy() - Method in class tests.CivControllerTest
Tests that a player is not allowed to attack their own unit.
attackValue - Variable in class components.Unit
 
attemptLoadGame(Stage) - Method in class views.CivView
attemptLoadGame() is called when the User clicks the "Load Game" button on our Main Menu.
